Reviews.Title: Great TV! LIght , thin and great performance.
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for a couple month, it has been working great!Most importantly, it is really cheap, so for college students like us, it is definitely a great choice!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Drana
Reviews.Content: dude, its amazing product,you would love it if you did,great value great product.It has 720p resolution which gives full HD.

Reviews.Title: Worked just fine
Reviews.Author: Justin Ham
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for $100 new from Amazon, and for the price I thought it was a steal. However, after a month or so I noticed there were several dead pixels on the screen. Days go by and it seems that there's just too many dead pixels. I guess it was a cluster of the pixels, because they were very easy to see on certain tv shows and games. I couldn't stand it anymore, so I sold it on ebay. When I used it the picture and sound were pretty nice. I don't know what Orion's customer service is like, but I figured it would take a while to ship it to them and have them ship me back a new/fixed one. I can't really recommend the tv unless you find it for $100 or less or just need a small tv for a small room.

Reviews.Title: Great for Price.
Reviews.Author: Sowrab
Reviews.Content: I bought this  T.V from wal-mart because it was inexpensive ($75) and i could use it as a computer monitor as well as a T.V. I i don't know why this is $119 the tv quality is not so great, but if the price was lowered i would buy one more.

Reviews.Title: Budget LCD
Reviews.Author: CSledge
Reviews.Content: This is actually my second Orion. I use them for dual screens. I have the first one for 7 months and no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: tracy durr
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture with good sound. Great product for a small room or young adult. Bought it for my nephew, he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: NH1225
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV i love it. clear picture and a great sound to it and you cant beat the price if it.

Reviews.Title: Orion 24" Class LED-LCD 720p 60Hz HDTV, SLED2468W Ultra-Slim 2.28"
Reviews.Author: dllewis
Reviews.Content: I love it, has a great picture.very thin and all the connections that you would need. I would recomand this TV to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: GGrantTX
Reviews.Content: Gave it as a gift and they have been happy. I have not used it myself beyond setting it up but have heard many raves by the receiver.

Reviews.Title: Picture problem
Reviews.Author: M. Gaffey
Reviews.Content: Bought it in November, 2012 and by January 2013 it developed a large dark area at the bottom right of the screen.From what I understand, this TV is "edge lit" which allows it to be thin, but, I also understand makes it prone to having the LED's conk out - which is what happened to mine.I will be very leery of LED TV's in the future.

Reviews.Title: Sorriest piece of junk ever made
Reviews.Author: RR
Reviews.Content: Picture is the worst ever. No detail in picture, especially faces. Extremely hard to watch football with blobs running around on field- again no detail. Have had this set in repair shop under warranty and no better on return. Would rate this zero star or minus stars if I could.

ProductInfo.Name: Orion 24" Class LED-LCD 720p 60Hz HDTV, SLED2468W Ultra-Slim 2.28"
